Body:
This is a very interesting question. What I think should be defined is:

  1. What language is concerned? Different languages may predefine different patterns.

  2. The happiness, in my opinion, has nothing to do with happiness of creativity. An unhappy person can be very creative (and sometimes even more so than a happy one).

  3. The terms you are looking for are psycholinguistical markers of emotional states (provided a creativity is a form of emotional state, of which I am not sure).
